Shadowy_Binds.help: You take control of your victim's shadow causing it to entangle and bind its owner thus leaving them immobilized and suffering from negative energy damage over time and reducing their chance to hit. Immobilized foes cannot move but can still attack. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Shadowy_Binds.shortHelp: Ranged, Moderate DoT(Negative), Foe Immobilize, -To Hit, -Fly
Shadowy_Binds.targetHelp: You have been entangled by Shadowy Binds and have been left immobilized.

Dark_Grasp.help: You cause your target's shadow to wholly envelop them, leaving them held and rendered helpless while suffering from moderate negative energy damage. Even if the target is powerful enough to resist the power's hold effect they will have their chance to hit reduced. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Dark_Grasp.shortHelp: Ranged, Moderate DMG(Negative), Foe Hold, -To Hit
Dark_Grasp.targetHelp: The Penumbral Grasp has stopped you in your tracks!

Living_Shadows.help: You extend and animate your own shadow causing it to entangle all foes within a long cone pattern in front of you, rendering all affected foes immobilized. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Moderate
Living_Shadows.shortHelp: Ranged (Cone), Minor DoT(Negative), Foe Immobilize, -To Hit, -Fly
Living_Shadows.targetHelp: The Living Shadows are holding you immobile and reducing your chance to hit.

Possess.help: You cause your targeted foe to be possessed by a dark entity from the Netherworld causing them to be confused for a short period of time. While confused they will be unable to tell the difference between friend or foe and will attack nearby allies. Recharge: Moderate
Possess.targetHelp: You have been confused and may attack an incorrect target.

messages.attackerHit: You Confuse {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
You Confuse {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
You Confuse {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} [OVERPOWER].

Fearsome_Stare.help: Instills tremendous Fear within a cone area in front of you, causing all affected targets to tremble in Terror uncontrollably. Recharge: Slow
Fearsome_Stare.targetHelp: The Fearsome Stare has terrified you and reduced your chance to hit.

messages.attackerHit: You Terrorize {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
You Terrorize {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
You Terrorize {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} [OVERPOWER].

Heart_of_Darkness.help: In a burst of negative energy you overwhelm the minds of those around you causing them to be disoriented and suffer minor negative energy damage over a short time. Affected targets will also have their chance to hit reduced. Damage: Minor (DoT), Recharge: Very Long
Heart_of_Darkness.shortHelp: PBAoE, Foe Disorient, -To Hit, Minor DoT(Negative)

Haunt.help: You summon a pair of Shades from the Netherworld to harass your target foe. Shades deal moderate damage and they terrorize their victims. Recharge: Very Long

Shadow_Field.help: You blanket a targeted area in darkness immediately holding foes within the field. Any foe who enters this area will have their chance to hit reduced and has a chance to be held for a short period of time. Recharge: Very Slow
Shadow_Field.targetHelp: You are rendered held by the Shadow Field.

messages.attackerHit: You create a Shadow Field nearby!

Umbra_Beast.help: You conjure up one of the most fearsome creatures of the Netherworld, the Umbra Beast. This creature will fight beside its summoner using its brutal claw, bite and darkness attacks. Recharge: Very Long

messages.attackerHit: You conjure forth a fierce Umbra Beast from the Netherworld to aid you in battle.
